biotools.summary: Tool for advanced analysis of three-way data (e.g., patient-gene-time in gene expression or subject-voxel-time in fMRI). It identifies both core modules that appear in multiple patients and patient-specific augmentations of these core modules that contain additional genes.

bioschemas.name: TWIGS
bioschemas.summary: Tool for advanced analysis of three-way data (e.g., patient-gene-time in gene expression or subject-voxel-time in fMRI). It identifies both core modules that appear in multiple patients and patient-specific augmentations of these core modules that contain additional genes.
